oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: International organic research theme: - Organic farming in Canada - Linking organic knowledge - Organic greenhouse production research in Canada - Researhing a limiting and limited nutrient - Prodctivity and growth in organic value chains (ProGrOV) - Root carbon input in arable cropping systems - Green veal is not dark red - Brief news
